entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
